actions.name: Celestial Hammer (Deva Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 17 (5d6) radiant damage. On a hit  the target can't make opportunity attacks against the deva until the beginning of the targets next turn.

actions.name: Divine Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (5d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Radiant Energy (1/Day)
actions.desc: The deva touches a creature other than itself. If the target is unwilling  the deva makes an attack roll with a +8 bonus. The deva can choose to magically heal 60 hit points of damage and end any blindness  curse  deafness  disease  or poison on the target. Alternatively  the deva can choose to deal 60 radiant damage to the target.

actions.name: Change Form
actions.desc: The deva magically transforms into a beast or humanoid or back into its true form. It retains its deva statistics  including speech and telepathy  except that it has the size  movement modes  and traits of its new form.

actions.name: Consume Life Energy (1/Day)
actions.desc: The angel feasts on the departing life energy of a humanoid within 5 feet. The target must have been slain within the last hour. The angel magically gains temporary hit points equal to half the dead creatures maximum hit points. These hit points last until depleted. Only a spell cast with a 9th-level slot can raise the corpse from the dead.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The deva has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Aligned
special_abilities.desc: An angel radiates a Lawful aura. Most angels also radiate a Good aura, and a few radiate Evil.

special_abilities.name: Celestial Dissolution
special_abilities.desc: When an angel dies, its body and equipment dissolve into motes of light.

special_abilities.name: Detect Alignment
special_abilities.desc: An angel knows the alignment, if any, of each creature within 30 feet that it can see.

special_abilities.name: Immortal Nature
special_abilities.desc: An angel doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.
